content: > for help and community join our free > fb group 1 **beach side bucket hat** **difficulty** intermediate **materials** drops paris uni color 100% cotton 50g 75 m 82 yds color dark blue light blue and cream - or any weight #4- total of approx 160 yards **hook** us size h-8 5 mm yarn needle scissors measuring tape **gauge** 15 st x 7 rounds 4 x 4 **sizes** it can be modified as you wish this sample is 8 in height and 21 in circumference **stitch key** chain = chain st = stitch double_crochet = double_crochet slip_stitch = slip_stitch increase = increase round stay calm and crochet sandra 1 https //www facebook com/groups/1485811495102299
